short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select some texts in a web page and search them in the SAP Note database.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Search SAP Notes with a selected text from right-click's context menu
- Option to toggle between Fiori UI and usual (legacy) web UI.
